actions.name: Ballistic (Contact)
actions.description: The user's next declared [Contact] Attack loses [Contact], gains [Missile] (if it already had [Missile], its Power increases by +30%), and has its Range multiplied by x6 until it is resolved.

actions.name: Ballistic (Missile)
actions.description: The user's next declared AoE [Missile] Attack has its Target change to Creature, and has its Range multiplied by x3 until it is resolved.

system.description:
The user may take two Actions on their Activations:

  1. The user spends 3 PP. The user's next declared [Contact] Attack loses [Contact], gains [Missile] (if it already had [Missile], its Power increases by +30%), and has its Range multiplied by x6 until it is resolved.

  2. The user spends 1 PP. The user's next declared AoE [Missile] Attack has its Target change to Creature, and has its Range multiplied by x3 until it is resolved.
